title: "Cyborg Line Art"
content:
# Cyborg Line Art

Welcome to Cyborg Line Art, the ultimate destination for minimalist art enthusiasts! Our website features a striking wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg in a bold color that is sure to make a statement on any device. 

But our site is more than just a pretty picture. We curate a collection of the best minimalist art from around the web, featuring everything from abstract designs to nature scenes. Our wallpapers are perfect for those who want to declutter their screens and focus on what's important.

At Cyborg Line Art, we believe that less is more. That's why we've chosen a simple design that puts the spotlight on our stunning artwork. So whether you're looking for a new wallpaper for your phone or desktop, or just want to browse some beautiful art, you've come to the right place.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg, in a striking color such as bright red or blue."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
